Union_City.West Caldwell Tech:
West Caldwell Tech is a regional public high school located in West Caldwell, that offers occupational and academic instruction for students in ninth through twelfth grades in Essex County, New Jersey, United States, operating as part of the Essex County Vocational Technical Schools.
As of the 2014-15 school year, the school had an enrollment of 275 students and 33.3 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 8.3:1. There were 168 students (61.1% of enrollment) eligible for free lunch and 43 (15.6% of students) eligible for reduced-cost lunch.
